Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Posredujemo u prodaji nove samostojeće moderne kuće u Kaštel Novom, u  neposrednoj blizini stare kaštelanske ceste. Kuća se sastoji od prizemlja 114m2 i kata 110m2. Prizemlje je kompletno uređeno i namješteno zajedno s bazenom u vrtu ispred, prvi kat  isto tako.Oba stana imaju odličan tlocrtni raspored. U prizemlju je veliki dnevni boravak , kuhinja i blagovaona, tri spavaće soba, kupatilo i mali wc. Na katu je   trosoban komforan stan. S obzirom na poziciju, ova nekretnina može biti mjesto trajnog življenja a isto tako i isplativa investicija. Vlasništvo uredno. Agencijska provizija za kupca ove nekretnine =3,0°% Više info 091 530 65 23 - Ivana ivana@nekretnineradman.com -------------------------------------- We mediate in the sale of a new detached modern house in Kaštel Novi, close to the old Kaštelan road. The house consists of a ground floor of 114m2 and a first floor of 110m2. The ground floor is completely decorated and furnished with a swimming pool in the garden in front, while the first floor is a tall Roh-bau. Both apartments have an excellent layout. On the ground floor there is a large living room, kitchen and dining room, three bedrooms, a bathroom and a small toilet. On the first floor, it is possible to divide into two one-room apartments or identically on the ground floor - one comfortable three-room apartment. Considering the apposition, this property can be a place of permanent living as well as a profitable investment. Ownership in order. Agency commission for the buyer of this property = 3.0% More info 091 530 65 23 - Ivana ivana@nekretnineradman.com
